text: And a young deer said to the deer, "Father, you are bigger and faster than dogs, and you have great horns to defend yourself against". Why are you running from them? And the deer laughed, and said, Well said thou, my son; but I know not what is happening to me; but when I hear the barking of a dog, I immediately run. Nothing can change a fearful mood.
title: El ciervo y el cervatillo
author: nan Esopo
